name: mulrcn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ctmd))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ctmd))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopRing →(mulGrp ` c0)∈ TopMnd)
⊣ ((mulGrp ` c0)∈ TopMnd → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ctmd))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopRing →(mulGrp ` c0)∈ TopMnd)
⊣ ((mulGrp ` c0)∈ TopMnd → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ctmd))
-| wceq(cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ ((mulGrp ` c0)∈ TopMnd → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ (mulGrp ` c0)=(mulGrp ` c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ctmd), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cmgp, c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, cfv(cmgp, c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((mulGrp ` c0)∈ TopMnd → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen `(mulGrp ` c0))
⊣ c1 =(+f `(mulGrp ` c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cmgp, c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, cfv(cmgp, c0)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ (mulGrp ` c0)=(mulGrp ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen `(mulGrp ` c0))
⊣ c1 =(+f `(mulGrp ` c0))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, cfv(cmgp, c0)))
-| wceq(cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ c2 =(TopOpen `(mulGrp ` c0))
⊣ (mulGrp ` c0)=(mulGrp ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(cmgp, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, cfv(cmgp, c0)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ (mulGrp ` c0)=(mulGrp ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(+f `(mulGrp ` c0))
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctrg), wcel(c1, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, cfv(cmgp, c0)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopRing → c1 ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
⊣ c1 =(+f `(mulGrp ` c0))
⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)

comment: The functionalization of the ring multiplication operation is a continuous function in a topological ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
